GuiEngineConfig Class Reference
[Config]

#include <GuiEngineConfig.hpp>

Detailed Description

Allows accessing the GUI engine configuration. This configuration file is mandatory for APOXI. The header file may not be changed or extended in any manner, it is only allowed to customize the implementation of the methods. If additional methods are needed for the MMI it is required to create a custom configuration file.

Member Function Documentation

static const ItemRendererProperties* GuiEngineConfig::GetDefaultItemRendererProperties (   )  [static]
 

Returns an instance of the item-renderer-properties which is used if no item-renderer-properties are specified for the item-renderer.

static const ColorValue* GuiEngineConfig::GetIconColorTable (   )  [static]
 

Returns a pointer to a color table for icons. Such a color table is required for native images using the indexed format. It's in the hand of the project configuration to decide how many colors are used for the icons, but the maximum is to return a pointer to 256 color values.

static Size GuiEngineConfig::GetIconSize (  IconState::Size  size  )  [static]
 

Returns the size corresponding the size defined by the icon-state.

static UINT32 GuiEngineConfig::GetImageBufferMax (   )  [static]
 

Returns the maximum available buffer for one decoded image. If 0 is returned, the maximum is only restricted by the available shared image-buffer (see GuiEngineConfig::GetSharedImageBufferMax). It might be useful to specify a image buffer maximum, if e. g. only a lot of small images should be buffered instead of one or two large images.

static ScrollBehavior GuiEngineConfig::GetScrollBehavior (   )  [static]
 

Defines the scroll behavior of all controls, where a selection can be made out of a number of items. Possible values are DefaultBehavior, BlockScrollBehavior and RotateBehavior.

static UINT32 GuiEngineConfig::GetSharedImageBufferMax (   )  [static]
 

Returns the maximum available buffer for all decoded images in bytes. If 0 is returned, no buffering is done. APOXI tries to buffer each decoded image to increase the drawing speed.

static AbstractTextRenderer& GuiEngineConfig::GetTextRenderer (  LanguageManager::LanguageType  language_id  )  [static]
 

Returns a text renderer applicable to the specified language, or a SimpleTextRenderer if the language does not support or need a text renderer

static AbstractItemRenderer* GuiEngineConfig::ObtainItemRenderer (  const ItemRendererProperties *  properties = 0  )  [static]
 

Obtains an instance of the class AbstractItemRenderer which uses the properties as for the rendering of the items.

static void GuiEngineConfig::ReleaseItemRenderer (  AbstractItemRenderer *  renderer  )  [static]
 

Releases the previously obtained instance of the renderer.
